tool.name: Cluster.classic
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='cluster.classic' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile,'^\S+\.[fna]n\.sabund$:'$sabund,'^\S+\.[fna]n\.rabund$:'$rabund,'^\S+\.[fna]n\.list$:'$otulist --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' --phylip="$dist" #if $name.__str__ != "None" and len($name.__str__) > 0: --name="$name" #end if #if $count.__str__ != "None" and len($count.__str__) > 0: --count="$count" #end if #if len($method.__str__) > 0: --method="$method" #end if #if float($cutoff.__str__) > 0.0: --cutoff="$cutoff" #end if "$hard" #if len($precision.__str__) > 0: --precision="$precision" #end if "$sim"

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff - Distance Cutoff threshold - ignored if not > 0
param.help: Ignore pairwise distances larger than this, a common value would be 0.10

param.name: hard
param.label: hard - Use hard cutoff instead of rounding

param.name: precision
param.label: precision - Precision for rounding distance values
param.help: Set higher precision for longer genome scale sequence lengths

param.name: sim
param.label: sim - Matrix values are Similary instead of Distance

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The cluster.classic_ command assign sequences to OTUs (Operational Taxonomy Unit).
.. _cluster.classic: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Cluster.classic
